sentence.Network_en: Tania stared at him aghast, unable to speak.
sentence.Network_cn: 塔妮娅吃惊地看着他，说不出话来。

sentence.Network_en: His colleagues were aghast at the sackings.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的同事们对于这些解雇感到很吃惊。

sentence.Network_en: She watched aghast as his life flowed away.
sentence.Network_cn: 看着他的生命逐渐消逝，她惊骇万分。

list.abs: The neighbors all stood aghast , and dared not move ., 邻居们都目瞪口呆 , 再不敢动.
co - workers had seemed aghast , and wanted to comfort them ., 同事们似乎很吃惊 , 想安慰他们.
I still feel slightly aghast at the idea of her leaving him there ., 一想到她把他留在那里 , 我仍然感到有点吃惊.
He aghast at the terrible sight ., 看到那可怕的景象 , 他吓得目瞪口呆.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : past participle of the obsolete verb agast, gast 'frighten', from Old English  gæsten. The spelling with gh (originally Scots) became general by about 1700, probably influenced by ghost; compare with ghastly

entry.def: If you are aghast, you are filled with horror and surprise.

example.ex: She watched aghast as his life flowed away...
example.tran: 看着他的生命逐渐消逝，她惊骇万分。

example.ex: His colleagues were aghast at the sackings...
example.tran: 他的同事们对于这些解雇感到很吃惊。

means.word_mean: 1. struck with fear, dread, or consternation

auth_sentence.content: Puppet jurors are portrayed as either aghast or asleep.
auth_sentence.res_content: Puppet jurors are portrayed as either aghast or asleep.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Puppet jurors are portrayed as either aghast or asleep.

auth_sentence.content: Civil libertarians are, for the most part, aghast.
auth_sentence.res_content: Civil libertarians are, for the most part, aghast.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Civil libertarians are, for the most part, aghast.

auth_sentence.content: School officials were receptive, even if some parents were aghast.
auth_sentence.res_content: School officials were receptive, even if some parents were aghast.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: School officials were receptive, even if some parents were aghast.

means.word_mean: 惊呆的，吓呆的，大吃一惊的

sentences.en: She was aghast at the extent of the damage to her car.
sentences.cn: 她的汽车的损坏程度使她震惊。

means.word_mean: 被…吓呆，被吓得目瞪口呆

sentences.en: She stood aghast at the snake.
He stood aghast at the terrible sight.
sentences.cn: 他被眼前的可怕景象吓呆了。

sentences.en: She stood aghast at the black shadow in the drawing room.
sentences.cn: 她被客厅里的黑影吓呆了。
